description.narrative:
The new spending proposal will be a replica of the current initiative, "Education Sector Development (INB555) and will cover mostly internal administrative costs including adhoc requests from GoPNG relevant to education. In particular it provides funding for;
• Participation in monitoring and review missions (including for GoPNG staff)
•Studies and reviews relevant to the PNG education sector
•Scoping and preparatory work for new activities
•Provision of technical and advisory support for the development of the education sector
•Quality assurance technical assistance for the education sector program ( including audits)
•Program wide, cross cutting activities such as HIV/AIDS, Gender, Disability and Climate
•Education sector planning and policy development activities involving GoPNG, AusAID (Desk, Post and Contracts Section), relevant advisors and other donors.
•Any other activities not directly related to current activities (Education Capacity Building
